item.title: Bout
item.description: She dances in front of me. And I sing her praises. I watch her wail and tail. She is my goddess. She has fire and might. Completing sight. If you just see the way She breathes To me. And I in turn ignite Her forthright Iâ€™ve never seen a better dance I would never give this up No other swimmer in my cup I am the drummer to her pup Such plain expression Delightful children Spiritual premise DANCE CHILD!
